main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects occurred on July 4, 1963, in Hamilton, Montana, including a disc-shaped object observed by a local resident.
interesting points: The first sighting involved observers looking at the Moon and stars, who noted an object resembling a star in flight., A local resident reported seeing a large, disc-shaped object that changed direction while being observed with binoculars., The conclusion from the military was inconclusive, speculating the object might be balloons or possibly an aircraft., The sightings were communicated to both NASA and the USAF for further investigation., Observers expressed curiosity about the nature of the flying objects and their appearance in the sky.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object, described as a star in flight and a large disc-shaped object
witness description: local residents who observed the objects at night
